Result: 0.5*mean had best cross validation results, but model was overfit on validation partition; Higher values underfit
Similar performance; Using 1.05*mean to be on the conservative side

Model Changes: Ensemble pipeline; Sub-models include ExtraTreesRegressor, Lasso, LinearRegression
Result: Highly overtrained and took a long time to run a single iteration

Model Changes: Ensemble pipeline; Sub-models include ExtraTreesRegressor, Lasso, LinearRegression
Result: Could only do a couple parameters at a time due to total run time defeating the purpose of GridSearchCV; ExtraTreesRegressor is too slow (would have taken over a week); Killed the job

Model Changes: Ensemble pipeline; Sub-models include DecisionTreeRegressor, Lasso, LinearRegression
Result: Still too slow to iterate effectively using GridSearchCV (would have taken at least 4 days); Issue is with Lasso; R-squared reached 0.50 range; Killed the job

Model Changes: Ensemble pipeline; Sub-models include DecisionTreeRegressor, SGDRegressor, LinearRegression
Result: CV iterations were much quicker with SGDRegressor; Appears to be slower with L1 regularization than L2 confirming Lasso was issue with slowness from previous iteration; SGD was not able to converge consistently with max_iter values of 2,000 and 7,000

Model Changes: Ensemble pipeline; Sub-models include DecisionTreeRegressor, SGDRegressor, LinearRegression
Hyperparameter Space: SGDRegressor penalty comparison between L1 and L2 regularization and max_iter increased to 10,000
Result: L2 (Ridge) regularization was much faster; A performant combination found for effective grid search; SGD convergence consistently achieved with max_iter at 10,000

Model Changes: Ensemble pipeline; Sub-models include DecisionTreeRegressor, SGDRegressor, LinearRegression
Result: Model trained in under 8 hours; Best parameters found and validated
